src:
FOTO: Heidi, si to ti? Grozljiva prikazen
Lepotica ni razočarala s svojo masko.
03 Nov 2019, 07:43 by P. K.
Manekenka Heidi Klum je znana po tem, da si za noč čarovnic da duška in priredi veliko zabavo, na kateri vsako leto znova preseneti in navduši s svojo izvirnostjo in predanostjo. Na letošnji zabavi je manekenka postavila nov mejnik – tako kar se tiče grozljivosti kostuma kot časa, ki ga je potrebovala za preobrazbo.Ekipa maskerjev je za to, da so 46-letno modno ikono spremenili v grozljivo nezemeljsko bitje, namreč potrebovala kar 12 ur.
text:
PHOTO: Heidi, Is It You? Horrific ghostly
The beauty did not disappoint with her mask.
03 Nov 2019, 07:43 by P.K.
Model Heidi Klum is known for giving her a sweetheart for Halloween and hosting a big party, at which she surprises and impresses each year with her originality and dedication. At this year's party, the model set a new milestone - both in terms of the horror of the costume and the time it took to transform it.
